exm.mng: (of the sun) to shine on, to bask in (the sunshine), to dry (clothes, grain etc) in the sun, (fig.) to expose and share (one's experiences and thoughts) on the Web (loanword from "share"), (coll.) to give the cold shoulder to
to leave out in the sun, to share files
to sunbathe, to tan, to get sunburnt, to expose unfair practices (on a consumer protection website)

to leave out in the sun, to share files
